name: 2018/10/16 Lunch
description: This high-protein, low-sugar meal is perfect for those who want to enjoy a healthy and delicious lunch. Featuring marinated baby bangus, tortang talong, fresh tomatoes, okra, and a hint of coconut with the dressing, it's a meal that's both nourishing and full of flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your grill or pan over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the tomatoes and okra under cold water, then slice the tomatoes and cut the okra into half-inch pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Beat the egg in a small bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the tortang talong by dipping the sliced eggplant in the beaten egg, then frying it until golden brown on both sides.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Grill the marinated baby bangus until it is fully cooked, approximately 10 minutes each side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mix the coconut amino and coconut vinegar to make a simple dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the grilled bangus and tortang talong with fresh slices of tomato, okra, and a drizzle of the coconut dressing.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
